short_summary: Procurement for multiple spares. Buy 3 types of spares. Guaranteed in Canada.
description: Procurement for multiple spares. Buy 3 types of spares. Guaranteed in Canada. Initial units ordered, sequential listing. The purchase is required at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites interest from qualified Canadian suppliers to bid on a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of multiple spares for the Canadian Armed Forces' Victoria-class ships.

## Procurement Details:

* RFP number: W8482-231351/A
* Solicitation number: W8482-231351/A
* Tender closing date: 2024-02-15T14:00:00
* Amendment number: 5
* Amendment date: 2024-02-15

## Procured Items:

The DND requires the following items:

* Bracket Locking Bolts
* Locking Bolts
* Pin Toggles, Eye Collars
* Tailshaft Assemblies

Each item has a unique part number, National Stock Number (NSN), and National alias and Identification catalogue (NCAGE). Specifically:

* Item 1: 1 EA of Bracket Locking Bolt (GSIN: 2010, NSN: 99-7528168, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 2: 1 EA of Bracket Locking Bolt (GSIN: 2010, NSN: 99-7528168, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* Item 3: 2 EAs of Locking Bolts (GSIN: 2010, NSN: 99-7528221, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 4: 1 EA of Locking Bolt (GSIN: 2010, NSN: 99-7528221, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* Item 5: 1 EA of Pin Toggle, Eye Collar (GSIN: 5315, NSN: 99-7528233, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 6: 2 EAs of Tailshaft Assemblies (GSIN: 2010, NSN: 20-A0C4886, NCAGE: K6451) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt

## Submission Requirements:

Suppliers must submit their proposals in English or French. Proposals must include:

* A detailed description of the offered products,
